Flow.description: This process includes updates to the Account, Opportunity, and Subscriptions upon updates. Removes logic around the Finance Status

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED( [ChargeOver_Subscription__c].Status__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( [ChargeOver_Subscription__c].Status__c ) , "Suspended" ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( [ChargeOver_Subscription__c].Status__c ) , "Cancelled manually" )), OR(ISPICKVAL( ( [ChargeOver_Subscription__c].Status__c) , "Current" ), ISPICKVAL( ( [ChargeOver_Subscription__c].Status__c) , "Overdue" )))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_14
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Status__c}), OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.Status__c} ) , "Suspended" ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.Status__c} ) , "Cancelled manually" )), OR(ISPICKVAL( ( {!myVariable_current.Status__c}) , "Current" ), ISPICKVAL( ( {!myVariable_current.Status__c}) , "Overdue" )))

Flow.label: Updates from ChargeOver Subscription
